text:
Current build: ''ITW_V1.alpha'' @@.smaller {{!!timestamp}}@@
The following are ''//highlights//'' of changes. For a complete list of all changes, please refer to the github history, online. //TBD: need proper link// !!!April 7, 2015 * still more tweaks to toolbars, navbar, etc. * investigating problem with navbar buttons when tag value contains spaces * content updates (based on feedback from Dave Gifford): move MicroContent under Benefits section, re-order Tour (story river before sidebar), re-write of [[DocumentOrWebsite]] !!!April 1, 2015 * lots of tweaks to toolbars, navbar, etc. * many content updates as well !!!March 28, 2015 * fixed float problem in [[InsideTW/ViewAll/Template]] * added more screen snaps for [[Tour]] tiddlers * refactored PublicPrivatePersonal (split from [[The Wiki Way]]) * new topics: TiddlerViewer, CustomFields * re-organized outline for [[Tour]] section * many content updates !!!March 24, 2015 * replaced .png icons with .svg for better resolution on high-density displays * added padding and margin around navbar titlebox * reduced used of bold text in AboutTheAuthor and [[What's in a name?]] * content updates to [[The Wiki Way]], [[Funding]], [[Reviewers]] * tweaks to toolbar buttons: back, search, home * contents toolbar button now shows as a popup! !!!March 23, 2015 * content updates: [[Reviewers]], [[How This Book Was Made]], [[Funding]] !!!March 22, 2015 * Reworked layout/placement of [[InsideTW/ToolBar]], [[InsideTW/Buttons/HomeAndSave]], and [[InsideTW/Buttons/ToggleReadOnly]] * Display [[InsideTW/DraftNotice]] in [[InsideTW/NavBar/Bottom]] (between buttons) * Adjusted styles for display of tiddler titlebar in edit mode * Hide tiddler subtitle (info not important) * Fixed Version link to popup [[InsideTW/RevisionHistory]] !!!March 21, 2015 * Initial release for feedback * Outline of topics is subject to continued refactoring * Topics are marked with status flag: ** notes - disorganized "brain dump" of ideas ** draft - ideas organized and turned into paragraphs ** revised - content rewritten based on feedback ** complete - content complete, including embedded images ** final - no more changes (except for typos, minor formatting, etc.)

''//or just choose any topic below://'' ---- @@float:right;[img width="130px" [images/googol.jpg]]@@ Of course, when it first started, "Google" was also simply a silly name -- an [[accidental misspelling of the mathematical term, "googol"|http://graphics.stanford.edu/~dk/google_name_origin.html]]. Now, only a few years later, "Google" is [[listed as both a verb and an adjective in the Oxford English Dictionary|http://www.oxforddictionaries.com/us/definition/american_english/google]]! ---- !!How to read this book <<< If you are reading this book online, there are several ways to view the content: * Tabbed Viewer: shows outline of topics on left, content on right. Click a title in the outline to view that page. If an arrow appears next to the title, there are more topics listed as subsections under that title. Click the arrow to view the additional topics. Clicking the arrow again will hide those titles. * Single Page: press the "hide tabs" button to display individual pages, one at a time. * Column of Pages: default ~StoryView is set to "zoomin" for one-at-a-time display... change the setting to "classic" to see multiple pages * All pages have a "nav bar" at the top, showing the title of the current page, as well as the "path" in the outline. * If a page has related topics under the same section, large "next/previous" chevrons provide links directly to these topics. * In addition to the interactive "browsing" methods, you can also display the entire book content at once by pressing the "view all" button. You can then ''//print the entire book//'' in one step <<<

text:
/* PAGE COLOR */
body { background-color: #ddf; }

/* ROUNDED CORNERS ON TIDDLERS */
.tc-tiddler-frame { border-radius:1em; }

/* HIDE TIDDLER SUBTITLE */
.tc-subtitle { display:none; }

/* PADDING ABOVE TITLE IN EDIT MODE */
.tc-tiddler-edit-title { padding-top:1em; }

/* REDUCE PADDING ON TIDDLER FRAME */
.tc-tiddler-frame { padding: 0 1em 1em 1em; }

/* MONO FONT AND LIMIT HEIGHT FOR EDITING */
.tc-edit-texteditor { font-family:monospace; max-height:20em; }

/* AUTO WIDTH FOR POPUPS */
.tc-drop-down { min-width:100px; }

/* STANDARD LINK COLOR IN POPUPS */
.tc-drop-down a, .tc-drop-down button { color:#5778d8; }

text:
/* FORMATTING SHORTCUTS */
.resize img { height:1em; }

.smaller { font-size:80%; line-height:100%; }
.larger  { font-size:120%;line-height:100%; }

.left    { text-align:left; }
.right   { text-align:right; }
.center  { display:block;text-align:center; }

.floatleft  { float:left; }
.floatright { float:right; }
.clear      { display:block;clear:both; }

.absolute { position:absolute; }
.relative { position:relative; }
.fixed    { position:fixed; }

.scroll   { overflow:scroll; }
.scroll-x { overflow-x:scroll; }
.scroll-y { overflow-y:scroll; }

.borderless, .borderless table,
.borderless td, .borderless tr, .borderless th, .borderless tbody
   	{ border:0 !important; margin:0 !important; padding:0 !important; }

.rotate-left-90 {
    display:block; top:50%; left:50%;
    transform: rotate(-90deg);
}

text:
.itw-topbar {
   position:fixed;
   z-index:1200;
   display: block;
   text-align: center;
   top: 2vh;
   left: calc(50% - ({{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/tiddlerwidth}} / 2));
   width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/tiddlerwidth}};
}
.itw-leftbar {
   position:fixed;
   z-index:1200;
   display: block;
   text-align: left;
   top:  5px;
   left: 5px;
}
.itw-topbar svg, .itw-leftbar svg {
   fill: black;
}
.itw-toolbar {
   xpadding: 0.5em;
   xborder: 1px solid #ccc;
   xborder-radius: 0.5em;
   xbackground-color: #fff;
   xbox-shadow: 5px 5px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
}

.itw-button {
   text-align:center;
   padding: 0.25em;
   border: 1px solid #666;
   border-radius: 0.3em;
   box-shadow: 5px 5px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
}
.itw-topbar .itw-button       { opacity:{{InsideTW/ToolBar/Stylesheet/ButtonFade}}; }
.itw-topbar:hover .itw-button { opacity:1.0; }
.itw-button:hover { opacity:1.0 !important; }

.itw-button:hover {
   border-color:#333;
   background-color:#ccc;
}

.itw-toolbar button {
   margin:0 0.25em;
}
.itw-toolbar .itw-drop-down button {
   margin:0;
}
/* INLINE LINKS AND BUTTONS IN CUSTOM POPUPS */
.itw-drop-down {
   border-radius:0.5em;
   padding:0.5em;
}
.itw-drop-down a, .itw-drop-down button
   { display:inline; width:auto; padding:0; }
.itw-drop-down .itw-button
   { padding:0 0.25em !important; }
